title: FOIL Method
text: The F stands for First, where we multiply the first component of each terms first. $$x x$$

title: FOIL Method
text: The O stands for Outer, where we multiply the first component of the second term with the $$\frac{second}{outer}$$ component of the second term. $$8x$$

title: FOIL Method
text: The I stands for Inner, where we multiply the inner components. $$6x$$

title: FOIL Method
text: The L stands for Last, where we multiply the last component of each terms. $$6\times8$$

title: Simplify
text: Simplify by combining the like terms. (6x and 8x)
